english.segment1: Prepare in urgency to race. Casting off the weight that burdens me. I cannot dare to force the pace. Marathon for life the road I face
english.segment2: Committed. determined. My gaze is set on finishing
english.segment3: Im straining to extend the lead. As every evil chases me. One day, one hour, every step
english.segment4: I know. I know. I fix. my eyes. Ahead
english.segment5: Straining on to run without remorse. Casting off mistakes that came before. In my mind I see a hallowed door. Open arm embrace, Im reaching for..
english.segment6: Just like a breeze is passing me. My stammers, a distant memory. We cannot afford a glance to see. Whats gaining or what is history
english.segment7: unyielding. unflinching. my gaze is set on finishing
